pages.text: Defeating the $(l:chronodawn:bosses/time_tyrant)Time Tyrant$(/l) grants:$(li)$(item)Eye of Chronos$() (restores time flow permanently)$(li)$(item)Stasis Core Shards$() (ultimate artifacts)$(br2)Craft powerful endgame items:$(li)$(item)Chronoblade$()$(li)$(item)Time Tyrant's Mail$()$(li)And more...
